Class: ModelError

ModelError

new ModelError(options)

Represents an error that occurred in a model, especially an asynchronous one that cannot be raised by throwing an exception because no one would be able to catch it.

Parameters:
Name Type Description
options Object

Object with the following properties:

Properties
Name Type Argument Default Description
sender Object <optional>

The object raising the error.
title String <optional>
 'An error occurred'

A short title describing the error.
message String

A detailed message describing the error. This message may be HTML and it should be sanitized before display to the user.
